abstract: British Prime Min David Cameron says in televised remarks he would like Britain to become more involved in fight against Islamic State overseas while at same time addressing threat of home-grown terrorists.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Cameron will seek to expand British airstrikes against the Islamic State, and will lay out a plan for confronting radicalism at home.

headline.main: David Cameron Wants Britain to Do More Against ISIS
headline.print_headline: Cameron Wants to Expand ISIS Fight

snippet: Mr. Cameron will seek to expand British airstrikes against the Islamic State, and will lay out a plan for confronting radicalism at home.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
